channel.title: [1.3.1][Factions] Imperial Craft! [PvP][Needs Staff/Builders]
channel.description:
[center][center][size=24pt][u][shadow=red,left]ImperialCraft[/shadow][/u][/size][/center]
ImperialCraft is a Survival PvP server in the works. We DO have factions, and allot more is to come. We need players to help give me and my builders ideas for the server. What to build, what to add, ETC.
Owner: DayDay101 ~Chimerica
Co-Owner: tyzzmania ~Tyler
[shadow=red,left][shadow=red,left]Ip[/shadow]= 97.104.81.196 [/shadow]
I hope to see you on! [/center] [center] MEDIA:
Spawn [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7l7JS.png[/img][/center]
Tell me if you'd like more info! ^_^
